channel.title: Music – m-flo
channel.description: Recent content in m-flo on Music

item.title: m-flo - come again
item.description:
It’s Friday

I want to play

On Saturday

don’t want to stay

At home

thinking of you

So let me party

all night long

It’s Friday

I want to play

On Saturday

don’t wanna waste

No more time

on you

So let me party

all night long
